plot: After a catastrophic event eliminates life in the year 2015, a handful of people mysteriously appear in 2012 and must prevent the disaster and figure out what sent them through time.
plot_en: After a catastrophic event eliminates life in the year 2015, a handful of people mysteriously appear in 2012 and must prevent the disaster and figure out what sent them through time.
plot_es: After a catastrophic event eliminates life in the year 2015, a handful of people mysteriously appear in 2012 and must prevent the disaster and figure out what sent them through time.
title: The Displaced
